Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller.states

  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    ActivateProdState
    Finalize the production when all the resources has been payed.
    BaseProdInState
    In this state the player has activated the base production and can select 2 resources in input to start the production.
    BaseProdOutState
    After selecting the resources in input, the player can select the resource wanted in output.
    BuyDevState
    This state follows the player's choice of buying a development card from the development card set
    CardProdState
    In this state the player has activated a production and can pay one by one all the resources required to produce.
    EndTurnState
    A player is in this state when is going to end his turn.
    ExtraProdOutState
    In this state the player has activated an extra production and can select the resource wanted in output.
    FirstTurn
    This identifies the first phase of the game where all the related players are asked to choose which leaderCards keep and, if necessary, which resources they want to receive
    MarketState
    A player is in this state when he must chose where to place the resources taken from the depot.
    MarketStrategyState
    A player is in this state when he must choose which leader card to use to convert the white marbles obtained by the market.
    PlaceDevState
    This state follows the resources payment needed for the purchase of a development card.
    ProductionState
    Enter in this state when a production is ended, player can now: - Start another production (card, base or extra) - Activate (or discard) leader cards - End the turn
    SelectionState
    Enter in this state when a player's turn ends and the game moves on to the next player's turn Here the current player can: - Activate/Discard a leader card - Activate a production - Go to the market - Buy a development card
    TurnState
    This class represents the state reached by the player during his turn.
  • Enum Summary
    Enum Description
    ErrorMessage
    Identify all the possible errors that can be sent to the client when something goes wrong
